#summary BeautyEye L&F简明开发者指南.

=== 第一步：如何开始？ ===

首先把 *`beautyeye_lnf.jar`* 文件作为lib放入你的项目并引用之.<br>
目前，*`beautyeye_lnf.jar`* 文件位于all_in_one包中的位置是：`all_in_one/dist/`


=== 第二步：如何使用BeautyEye L&F？ ===

{{{
try
{
    org.jb2011.lnf.beautyeye.BeautyEyeLNFHelper.launchBeautyEyeLNF();
}
catch(Exception e)
{
    //TODO exception
}
}}}

=== 附录1：如何定义窗口边框类型？ ===

{{{
try
{
    //设置本属性将改变窗口边框样式定义
    BeautyEyeLNFHelper.frameBorderStyle = BeautyEyeLNFHelper.FrameBorderStyle.osLookAndFeelDecorated;
    org.jb2011.lnf.beautyeye.BeautyEyeLNFHelper.launchBeautyEyeLNF();
}
catch(Exception e)
{
    //TODO exception
}
}}}

=== 附录2：有几种窗口边框类型？ ===

|| *序号* || *窗口边框尖型* || *代码* || *BeautyEye中默认使用* || *效果图* ||
|| 1 || 系统默认边框 || `FrameBorderStyle.osLookAndFeelDecorated` ||  || http://beautyeye.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/screenshots/x3.png ||
|| 2 || 强立体感半透明边框 || `FrameBorderStyle.translucencyAppleLike` || java1.6.0_u10及更高版本时 || http://beautyeye.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/screenshots/x4.png ||
|| 3 || 弱立体感半透明边框 || `FrameBorderStyle.translucencySmallShadow` ||  || http://beautyeye.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/screenshots/x1.png ||
|| 4 || 普通不透明边框 || `FrameBorderStyle.generalNoTranslucencyShadow` || java1.5版本时 || http://beautyeye.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/screenshots/x2.png ||

=== 附录3：如何使用不同颜色的按钮？ ===

|| *序号* || *代码* || *BeautyEye中默认* || *效果图* ||
|| 1 ||  `btnInstance.setUI(new BEButtonUI().setNormalColor(BEButtonUI.NormalColor.normal));` ||  || http://beautyeye.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/screenshots/btn2.png ||
|| 2 ||  `btnInstance.setUI(new BEButtonUI().setNormalColor(BEButtonUI.NormalColor.green));` || YES || http://beautyeye.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/screenshots/btn1.png ||
|| 3 ||  `btnInstance.setUI(new BEButtonUI().setNormalColor(BEButtonUI.NormalColor.lightBlue));` ||  || http://beautyeye.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/screenshots/btn3.png ||
|| 4 ||  `btnInstance.setUI(new BEButtonUI().setNormalColor(BEButtonUI.NormalColor.blue));` ||  || http://beautyeye.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/screenshots/btn4.png ||
|| 5 ||  `btnInstance.setUI(new BEButtonUI().setNormalColor(BEButtonUI.NormalColor.red));` ||  || http://beautyeye.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/screenshots/btn5.png ||
